description: Translate only rows where dist_type1 is not empty
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Maps source value to DIST_TYPE_1 using lists of values

validation_rules: tt_notEmpty({origine, an_origine, perturb, an_perturb}, any=TRUE), tt_notEmpty({an_origine, an_perturb}, any=TRUE|UNKNOWN_VALUE)
tt_hasCountOfNotNull({origine, an_origine}, {perturb, an_perturb}, 2|NOT_APPLICABLE), tt_notEmpty({origine, perturb}, any=FALSE|UNKNOWN_VALUE)
description: Maps source value to DIST_TYPE_2 using lists of values

validation_rules: tt_hasCountOfNotNull({origine, an_origine}, {perturb, an_perturb}, 2|NOT_APPLICABLE), tt_notEmpty({an_origine, an_perturb}, any=FALSE|UNKNOWN_VALUE)
